venue.address_1: Corner of Route 20 and Prospect Street
venue.name: Chuck's Restaurant

item.description: Every Thursday, trivia is held at Chuck's. Teams are comprised of mostly 6 people. An emcee reads questions in various categories, and the team submits an answer. The team with the most points wins an award, usually a Chuck's gift certificate.
item.how_to_find_us: I have a small meetup sign. Also, I will give out my cell number closer to the event
item.name: Trivia at Chuck's
